resources.string: stuff you put on your body
tops (t-shirt, shirt, sweaters, jumper, cardigan, hoodie), trousers (jeans, shorts), skirt, dress, gown
shoes, boots, rubber boots, sandals, slippers, flip-flops, clogs
socks, briefs, box, pajamas, lingerie (panties/knickers, bra, thong, nightgown), hosiery (stockings, leggings, tights/pantyhose)
belt, suspenders, purse, wallet, tie, glove, scarf, umbrella, jewelry (glasses, monocle, watch, pocket watch)
swimwear, running gear, cycling shorts, ski clothes, thermal

plastic container, tray, bucket, basket, basin, bottle, flask, jar, can
crate, trunk, chest, barrel, sack, bin

suitcase, handbag, backpack, purse, plastic bags, pet carrier
stuff you don\'t need, but still have
picture (painting, poster, frame) sculpture (statue, figurine, wax, glass, mask, origami, signs), antique (painting, furniture, appliances), ceramic (vase, pot, china)
book, magazine, newspaper, album, catalog, pamphlet, flier
CD, DVD, BD, tape, cassette, vinyl
stuff you can ingest raw, or processed

long-life (coffee, tea, chips, cigarettes, instant packets, pet food), canned (fish, lunch meat, fruit), jar (jam, marmalade, baby food), frozen? (ready meal, vegetables, fruit, ice cream), sweets (chewing gum, candy)

drinks (mineral water, soft drink, fruit juice, concentrated fruit syrup), alcoholic beverages (wine, beer, cider, champagne), distilled spirit (liquor, liqueur, rum, vodka, whisky, brandy, gin, tequila), condiments (lemon juice, cooking oil, vegetable oil, olive oil, vinegar, soy sauce)

staple food (flour, rice, pasta), grains (wheat, corn, breadcrumbs, semolina, bean, legumes) table sauces (ketchup, mustard, wasabi, mayonnaise, BBQ sauce, hot sauce, tomato sauce, chili sauce, salsa), seasoning (salt, sugar, honey, sweetener, pepper, paprika), spices (vanilla, cinnamon, clove), additives (food coloring)
stuff that helps you live a better life

medication (pills, tablets, capsule, suppository, syringe, gel, paste, cream, lotion, balm, ear drops, eye drops, nasal spray, vitamin), instruments (scale, temperature meter, sphygmomanometer, blood sugar meter), dressing (gauze, bandage, adhesive bandage/Band-Aid/sticking plasters), prostheses (dentures, hearing/visual aids), orthoses (plaster cast, braces, knee, ankle, foot), mobility aids (wheelchair, cane, crutches)

body hygiene (soap, liquid hand soap, shower gel, shampoo), oral hygiene (toothpaste, toothbrush, mouthwash, dental floss), tissue (Kleenex/handkerchief, paper towel, toilet paper, wet wipe, cotton pad, cotton ball), reproductive health (nappies, condom, lubricants, sanitary pad, tampon)

hair products (conditioner, hair spray, hair dye, hair gel, hair brush), trimming (razors, shaving foam, shaving gel, tweezer, nail clipper, nail file), perfume (deodorant, cologne, eau de toilette, essential oils, jojoba, scent, aroma), makeup (lipstick, lip balm, lip gloss, foundation, concealer, toner, blush, eyeliner, mascara, nail polish, cleanser, remover), skin care (exfoliants, scrubs, moisturizer, waxing, vaseline, sun lotion, body lotion), manicure, pedicure
stuff that makes your other stuff look pretty
vase, figurine, plant, candle, fridge magnet
parties (house-, birthday-, bachelor-, balls), New Year\'s, Halloween, Valentine\'s Day, Christmas, Easter, Thanksgiving; balloon
folk art, religious motifs, religious objects

lamp, wall-clock, alarm clock, pipe, blinds, thermostat

alteration (stapler, hole puncher, scissors), measurement (straight ruler, angle, protractor, compass), tapes (Duct/Cloth tape, Sellotape/Scotch/Sticky Tape), fasteners (paperclip, push pin, binder clip)

hand tools (screwdriver, wrench, clamps, army-knife, awl, hammer, mallet, saw, pick, axe), power tools (chainsaw, sander, drill, jackhammer, nail gun, blow torch, compressor, pump)
lawn mover, shovel, rake, spade, pitchfork, hoe, leaf blower, watering can, pot, saucers/drip trays, sprinkler, hose
stencils, brush, needle, dye/paint cutting tools (knife, scissors, blade, scalpel, sandpaper), adhesive (glue, Blu-tack, wallpaper paste), fastener (nails, bolts, nuts, pegs)

wood, sawdust, metal, glass, cat litter, fabrics (textile, wool, yarn, thread, rope, twine, wire, shoelaces), building blocks (bricks, tile, roof tiles), aggregates (sand, gravel, pebbles, cement, limestone)

air-freshener spray, air-freshener gel, furniture spary, pesticide (anti-insect spray, rat poison, ant bait, mouse trap), detergent (laundry detergent, washing powder, laundry pod, washing tablet, fabric softener, washing up liquid, window cleaner, windshield washer liquid), disinfectants (toilet cleaner, floor & surface cleaner, bleach), fuel (gasoline, petrol, motor oil, petroleum, kerosene, distilled water), fertilizer (plant food, compost, potting soil)

boards games (chess, checkers, go), multiplayer games (Charades, Scrabble, Monopoly, Risk, Catan), card games (Pok√©mon, Yu-Gi-Oh, French playing cards)

user guide, owner\'s manual, instructions, help
stuff you mostly use in your spare time
sweatband, sneakers, cap (baseball-, swimming-), snorkel, flippers protective gear (helmet, gloves, goggles, glasses, knee pads)

balls (soccer, basketball, baseball, handball, volleyball, beach ball, hockey puck), rackets (tennis, squash, badminton), bats (baseball bat, cricket bat, croquet mallet, polo mallet, golf club, hockey stick), partition (net, basketball hoop, goal posts), gliders (roller skate, rollerblade, ice skate, ski, snowboard, skateboard, surfboard)
weights, medicine ball, punch bag, mat, bench, machine (bike, treadmill, cross trainer, elliptical trainer)

lodging (tent, sleeping bag, air mattress), catering (stove, barbecue, cool-box/cooler/chilly bin/Esky), fishing tackle (rod, reel, line, hook, sinker, float, bait, net, trap), mobile lighting (lantern, kerosene lamp, flashlight, torch, solar power light)

human-powered (bicycle, unicycle, monowheel, scooter), motorized (motorcycle, car, SUV, quad), trucks (golf cart, pickup, lorry, van, bus), trailers (recreational vehicle, wagon, carriage, trains), heavy equipment (tractor, forklift), aircraft (plane, helicopter, drones), watercraft (boat, ship, submarine)

parts (wheel, engine, light, break, mirror, horn, bell, seat, basket), accessories (lock, high-visibility, covers, air freshener, first aid kit, child safety seat), maintenance (lubricants/oil, pump, key, puncture kit, repair kit), electronics (GPS/Satellite navigation, radio, audio-visual entertainment systems)
mostly stuff that has some silicon in it
stuff that makes your life easier

cooking (stove, oven, microwave), kitchen (refrigerator, freezer), laundry (dishwasher, washing machine, dryer), thermoregulation (heater, fan, air conditioning, thermostat), boiler, kiln, grills (barbecue)

cleaning (iron, vacuum cleaner, robovac), hair styling (hairdryer, curling iron, hair straightener), kitchen (toaster, kettle, coffee maker, mixer), air control (humidifier, dehumidifier, vaporizer, water pipe, e-cigarette)
battery (AA, AAA, AAAA, B, C, D), fuse, spark plug, N2O whipped-cream charger, CO2 soda charger
cameras (video, digital, DSC, DSLR, HD, 4K), dictaphone, photocopier
recoding player (CD, DVD, BD, VHS, MP3, MP4, vinyl), AM/FM radio, headphones
monitor, TV, projector; CRT, LCD, TFT, IPS, LED, plasma, OLED

Macintosh, PC/personal computer, laptop (notebook, netbook, tablet), game consoles (Xbox, Nintendo Wii, Sony Playstation, Sega, Atari), smart phone (Android, Apple iPhone, Samsung), GPS/Satellite navigation, scientific calculators

keyboard, mouse, webcam, printer, scanner, computer internals (PCI, AGP, PCMCIA, PCI-Express cards), storage (hard drive, external, pendrive, ATA, PATA, SATA, HDD, SSD, RAID; card reader, MMC, SD, microSD, SDHC MemoryStick Pro Duo)
